# WaveFormLoading

![Alt Text](https://media.giphy.com/media/T6qtx3jg9obew1KRsG/giphy.gif)

<h2>Requirements</h2>

iOS 9.3+
xCode 10

<h2>Installation</h2>
Cocoa Pods
pod 'WaveFormLoading', :git => 'https://github.com/MauroJuliano/WaveFormLoading.git'

<h2>Usage</h2>
